forumsToExport: {number} of forum whcih should be exported (from prefix_FORUMS)

mysql.prefix: prefix for ubb forum (default is probably ubb_)
mysql.realCharset: e.x. Latin_2 (db maybe is latin1 collated, but strings could have any other larin compatible encoding. This is used for converting. If UTF-8 then no conversion is applied.

attachmentsPath: {string} attachments paths on the same server
